snippet: Four men associated with a growing ultraconservative Islamic movement were accused of plotting to kill the leader of a far-right political party.
lead_paragraph: Four men associated with a growing ultraconservative Islamic movement were accused of plotting to kill the leader of a far-right political party.

headline.seo: Germany Arrests 4 and Bans Groups Linked to Salafism
headline.main: Germany Arrests 4 and Bans Groups Linked to Salafism
headline.print_headline: Germany Arrests 4 and Bans Groups Linked to Salafism
